title: Mamaearth - Business Analyst
description:
Glimpse of the problems we are trying to solve :


Personalization : To improve our customer engagement, pitching the most relevant products to the consumers at the right pricing within the guard rails
Demand & Supply Optimization : Accurately forecasting the demand and optimizing it for revenue loss and inventory days
Anomaly detection engine : Identifying the different kind of frauds a. bulk ordering, b. coupon code frauds
Market Mix Modeling : Recommendation engine for optimizing return on marketing investments
Shipment Allocation Engine
Allocation of order to the warehouse based on multiple factors like TAT, NPS, costs etc
Allocation of the order to the 3PL based on the SLAs, cost, TAT etc


Role & Responsibilities


Develop deep understanding of the data points collected and steer decisions in the right direction
Build, test and deploy optimization and forecasting/prediction models to solve for business and product needs independently
Communicating results of the models and analyze in a way that can be understood by the business
Identify the optimization areas from the data and create steps to remove the inefficiencies


What are we looking for ?


Strong foundation in Mathematics and Stats.
With deep understanding supervised and unsupervised ML algorithms.
Strong understanding of Python & SQL
Should be able work independently and is the go-getter
Excellent verbal and written communication skill.
2+ years of experience in the field of Data science & Analytics
